subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Domestic Violence
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: Corwin Brown, a former Notre Dame defensive coordinator, received a suspended four-year sentence for hitting his wife, Melissa, and holding her hostage during a police standoff last August.
snippet: Corwin Brown, a former Notre Dame defensive coordinator, received a suspended four-year sentence for hitting his wife, Melissa, and holding her hostage during a police standoff last August.
